note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

When a Cargo Temperature Selector is inoperative, zone temperature controllers automatically default to a target of 60°F for the associated zone. If the temperature selector's MAN mode remains available, associated zone temperature other than 60 may be obtained by selecting MAN and then W (warmer) or C (cooler) as desired to move the associated trim air mod valve. Cargo compartment temperatures are available on the ECS synoptics page.

numlitem.para: If Manual Mode is not available, carriage of animals and perishables in associated cargo compartment is prohibited.

placard.para: Placard associated Cargo Temperature selector "TEMPERATURE SELECTOR INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
